movies.title: Fei hu xiong xin 2 zhi ao qi bi tian gao

biography.bio: Daniel Hiu Tung Chan was born on September 3, 1975 in Shanghai, China as Chan Cheuk-Yeung. He is known for his work on Hu Du Men (1996), A War Named Desire (2000) and Chu lian wu xian Touch (1997). He has been married to Vicky Wang since February 12, 2014. They have one child.
biography.name: Daniel Hiu Tung Chan

biography.bio: Miu-Ying Chan was born on August 1, 1972. She is an actress, known for Ebola Syndrome (1996), Shen si guan fan an (1993) and Nan yang di yi xie jiang (1996).
biography.name: Miu-Ying Chan

biography.bio: Julian Cheung was born on August 27, 1971 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for B gai waak (1998), Bong ga (2007) and Chuet sik san tau (2001). He is married to Anita Yuen. They have one child.
biography.name: Julian Cheung

biography.bio: Roy Cheung was born on July 20, 1963 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Yiu-Yeung Cheung. He is an actor, known for In the Mood for Love (2000), The mission (1999) and Exilé (2006).
biography.name: Roy Cheung

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Shou-Liang was born in China in 1953 before moving to live in Taiwan when he was three. When he was 16 he had taken up motorsports and had begun racing motorcycles and cars professionally. Shortly after this he got into acting for films. Spotting that most stuntmen in Taiwan specialised in martial arts and such, Ko became one of the first stuntmen to focus on stunts involving motorcycles and cars. This area of work soon allowed him to work behind the camera as a stunt arranger. Outside of movie work his most memorable achievement came in 1997 when he used a modified Mitsubishi to jump 50 metres over China's yellow river. The jump was carried live on television and he dedicated it to the handover of Hong Kong back to China. He also announced his retirement and spent his time raising money for charities. He was also a singer and enjoyed fishing.
biography.name: Blackie Shou Liang Ko

biography.bio: Jerry Lamb was born on September 29, 1970 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996), Young and Dangerous 3 (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996). He has been married to Lily Hong since December 19, 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Jerry Lamb

biography.bio: Damian Lau was born on October 14, 1949. He is an actor and producer, known for The Heroic Trio (1993), Last Hurrah for Chivalry (1979) and Zu: Warriors from the Magic Mountain (1983).
biography.name: Damian Lau

biography.bio: Wai-Kai Law is an actor and production manager, known for Connected (2008), Kung Fu Killer (2014) and Ci Yun Shan shi san tai bao (1995).
biography.name: Wai-Kai Law

biography.bio: Amanda Lee was born on October 4, 1970 in Hong Kong as Wai-Man Lee. She is an actress, known for Full Alert (1997), Shanghaï grand (1996) and 9413 (1998).
biography.name: Amanda Lee

biography.bio: Sammuel Leung was born on December 3, 1973 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and composer, known for Beast Cops (1998), Shou xing xin ren lei (2000) and That Demon Within (2014).
biography.name: Sammuel Leung

biography.bio: Sammy Leung was born on December 3, 1973 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for True Women for Sale (2008), Love Is Not All Around (2007) and Breeze of July (2007).
biography.name: Sammy Leung

biography.bio: Karen Mok was born on June 2, 1970 in Hong Kong as Karen Joy Morris. She is an actress, known for Shaolin Soccer (2001), Man of Tai Chi (2013) and Around the World in 80 Days (2004). She has been married to 'Johannes' since October 1, 2011.
biography.name: Karen Mok

biography.bio: Annie Wu was born on August 21, 1978 in Taiwan as Chen-Chun Wu. She is known for her work on Police Story 4: First Strike (1996), Island of Greed (1997) and Ban sheng yuan (1997).
biography.name: Annie Wu

biography.bio: Herman Yau was born in 1961 in Guangzhou, China. He is a director and cinematographer, known for The Legend Is Born: Ip Man (2010), Ip Man: Le combat final (2013) and The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story (1993).
biography.name: Herman Yau
